text: Really, this is just a pet project to play around with system programming in C/C++ in Linux.

sections.title: Testing
text: In order to test Lazybox, there are 3 components:

1) CTest - Executes the Lazybox binary and the various symlinks to verify that the commands are executed as expected. In addition, each command is run through [Valgrind](http://www.valgrind.org/) to ensure there are no memory leaks.
2) Unity - Unit testing for code written in C.
3) Google Test - Unit testing for code written in C++.

sections.title: Code Generation
text: There are several files which are automatically generated as a part of the build process.
